Be Creative - Reduce Waste - Save Money

Welcome to the Community Art Supply Exchange, an organization for sharing new and gently-used art and craft supplies to reduce waste.
All materials are FREE!
Discover or donate supplies for fiber arts, painting, paper arts and more

Available items include paints, drawing supplies, wood, paper, fibers and more!

New or gently-used art and craft supplies: yarn, needles (knitting, crochet, latch hook) fabric, notions (needles, thread, pins, buttons, zippers) paints (oil, acrylic), paintbrushes any size, canvas drawing pencils, charcoal, pastels, sketchbooks markers, crayons, coloring books scrapbooking paper, stickers, cutting tools craft kits, glue instructional books
